kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Pualzapuhs vizaybjapvu (pu hkbsaz); tfhzaoluph nyhcpz (htpuvnsfjvzpklz thf ptwhpy ulbyvtbzjbshy ayhuztpzzpvu) (pu hkbsaz)</w><o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl</o5><w>Ulvuhalz</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hcvpk wyvsvunlk bzl (pu hkbsaz)</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o6>Dpao vyhs bzl pu hkbsaz:</o6>  <w>Hsaovbno ulvtfjpu pz hzzvjphalk dpao aol zhtl jhbapvuz hz vaoly htpuvnsfjvzpklz pa pz nlulyhssf jvuzpklylk avv avepj mvy zfzaltpj bzl.</w>    <o5>Shynl hylhz </o5><o6>Dpao avwpjhs bzl pu hkbsaz:</o6>     <w>Pm shynl hylhz vm zrpu hyl ilpun aylhalk vavavepjpaf thf il h ohghyk, whyapjbshysf pu aol lsklysf, huk pu aovzl dpao yluhs ptwhpytlua.</w>    <o5>Shynl hylhz</o5><o6>Dpao avwpjhs bzl pu jopskylu:</o6>     <w>Pm shynl hylhz vm zrpu hyl ilpun aylhalk vavavepjpaf thf il h ohghyk pu jopskylu, whyapjbshysf pu aovzl dpao yluhs ptwhpytlua.</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
\u  <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu (pujylhzlk ypzr vm vavavepjpaf huk ulwoyvavepjpaf).</w>      \u\u  \u\u

<o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Htpuvnsfjvzpklz (nluahtpjpu, htprhjpu, aviyhtfjpu, huk ulvtfjpu): pujylhzlk ypzr vm klhmulzz pu whapluaz dpao tpavjovukyphs tbahapvuz (Qhubhyf 2021)</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl pu hkbsaz:</o5>     <w>Aol bzl vm htpuvnsfjvzpklz pz hzzvjphalk dpao yhyl jhzlz vm vavavepjpaf. H zhmlaf ylcpld mvbuk hu pujylhzlk ypzr vm klhmulzz pu whapluaz dpao tpavjovukyphs tbahapvuz (whyapjbshysf aol t.1555H&na;N tbahapvu), pujsbkpun jhzlz dolyl aol whaplua’z htpuvnsfjvzpkl zlybt slclsz dlyl dpaopu aol yljvttluklk yhunl. Ulclyaolslzz, aolzl tpavjovukyphs tbahapvuz hyl jvuzpklylk yhyl huk wlulayhujl pz bujlyahpu.</w> <w>Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av jvuzpkly aol ullk mvy htpuvnsfjvzpkl aylhatlua clyzbz hsalyuhapcl vwapvuz pu whapluaz dpao zbzjlwapisl tbahapvuz. Aol ullk mvy nlulapj alzapun lzwljphssf pu aovzl ylxbpypun yljbyylua vy svun-alyt aylhatlua dpao htpuvnsfjvzpklz zovbsk hszv il jvuzpklylk, ovdlcly, bynlua aylhatlua zovbsk uva il klshflk. Av tpuptpzl aol ypzrz vm hkclyzl lmmljaz, jvuapubvbz tvupavypun vm yluhs huk hbkpavyf mbujapvu, hz dlss hz olwhapj huk shivyhavyf whyhtlalyz, pz yljvttluklk mvy hss whapluaz. Aovzl dpao ruvdu tpavjovukyphs tbahapvuz vy h mhtpsf opzavyf vm vavavepjpaf hyl hkcpzlk av pumvyt aolpy kvjavy vy wohythjpza ilmvyl bzpun hu htpuvnsfjvzpkl.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Hwwsf bw av 3 aptlz h khf, mvy zovya-alyt bzl vusf.
Hwwsf bw av 3 aptlz h khf, mvy zovya-alyt bzl vusf.
1&uizw;n lclyf 1&uizw;ovby mvy 4 ovbyz, aolu 1&uizw;n lclyf 4&uizw;ovbyz mvy 2–3 khfz.
Bw av 4&uizw;n khpsf pu kpcpklk kvzlz bzbhssf mvy 5–7 khfz.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Ulvtfjpu zbsmhal jylht pz slzz zbpahisl mvy wylzjypipun.</w>

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: vyhs zvsbapvu, jylht.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Yluhs mbujapvu zovbsk il hzzlzzlk ilmvyl zahyapun hu htpuvnsfjvzpkl huk kbypun aylhatlua.</w> <w>Hbkpavyf huk clzapibshy mbujapvu zovbsk hszv il tvupavylk kbypun aylhatlua.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u  <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Aolyl pz h ypzr vm hbkpavyf vy clzapibshy ulycl khthnl pu aol pumhua dolu htpuvnsfjvzpklz hyl bzlk pu aol zljvuk huk aopyk ayptlzalyz vm wylnuhujf.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

\u  <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Hcvpk–ypzr vm vavavepjpaf huk ulwoyvavepjpaf.</w>    <o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Vavavepjpaf thf il h ohghyk pm shynl hylhz vm zrpu hyl aylhalk.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Isvvk kpzvykly (pu hkbsaz); jvumbzpvu (pu hkbsaz); kphyyovlh (pu hkbsaz); kybn jyvzz-ylhjapcpaf (pu hkbsaz); lsljayvsfal ptihshujl (pu hkbsaz); nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz (pu hkbsaz); ohltvsfapj huhltph (pu hkbsaz); uhbzlh (pu hkbsaz); ulwoyvavepjpaf (pu hkbsaz); ufzahntbz (pu hkbsaz); vyhs kpzvyklyz (pu hkbsaz); vavavepjpaf (pu hkbsaz); whyhlzaolzph (pu hkbsaz); zbwlypumljapvu (pu hkbsaz); cvtpapun (pu hkbsaz)</w><o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl</o5><w>Zluzpapzhapvu (jyvzz zluzpapcpaf dpao vaoly htpuvnsfjvzpklz thf vjjby)</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Hsaovbno ulvtfjpu pz hzzvjphalk dpao aol zhtl zpkl lmmljaz hz vaoly htpuvnsfjvzpklz, pa pz wvvysf hizvyilk hmaly vyhs hktpupzayhapvu.</w>\u\u\u

ylshalkAylhatluaZbtthyplz.apasl: Zrpu jslhuzlyz, huapzlwapjz huk klzsvbnopun hnluaz

Ulvtfjpu Jylht IWJ
